opinion.posture: Indictments charging defendant with larceny, receiving stolen goods, and operating a motor vehicle with defaced serial number. Before CLARKE, J., without a jury. Appeal, No. 48, April T., 1973, from judgment of sentence of Court of Common Pleas, Criminal Division, of Allegheny County, Jan. T., 1972, No. 731. Argued April 12, 1973.
opinion.attorneys: Joseph T. Kosek, Jr., with himJames Victor Voss, and Neely and Voss, for appellant; J. KentCulley, Assistant District Attorney, with him Robert L.Eberhardt, Assistant District Attorney, and Robert W. Duggan, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
